segments.text: I peek into the kitchen and smile at the domestic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks content drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window brightens everything up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at that sink overflowing like a fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, foot in the puddle without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, they're the real stars here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing for cookies on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waiting eagerly, it's adorable mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, perfect for their little raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts, but he's hanging on determinedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't drop any cookies on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is so serene, contrasting their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This reminds me of my own childhood antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to get away with it, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR
